hero.description: Explore our cutting-edge dashboard, delivering high-quality solutions tailored to your needs. Elevate your experience with top-tier features and services.

features.description: Provide a brief overview of the key features of the product. For example, you could list the number of features, their types or benefits, and add-ons.

items.dashboardText: This item could provide a snapshot of the most important metrics or data points related to the product.
items.mobileText: This item could provide information about the mobile app version of the product.
items.allText: This item could let users know the product is available on all platforms, such as web, mobile, and desktop.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.description: See what our customers love about our products. Discover how we excel in efficiency, durability, and satisfaction. Join us for quality, innovation, and reliable support.

highlights.title: Highlights
highlights.description: Explore why our product stands out: adaptability, durability, user-friendly design, and innovation. Enjoy reliable customer support and precision in every detail.

performance.title: Adaptable performance
performance.description: Our product effortlessly adjusts to your needs, boosting efficiency and simplifying your tasks.

made.title: Built to last
made.description: Experience unmatched durability that goes above and beyond with lasting investment.

experience.title: Great user experience
experience.description: Integrate our product into your routine with an intuitive and easy-to-use interface.

innovative.title: Innovative functionality
innovative.description: Stay ahead with features that set new standards, addressing your evolving needs better than the rest.

support.title: Reliable support
support.description: Count on our responsive customer support, offering assistance that goes beyond the purchase.

precision.title: Precision in every detail
precision.description: Enjoy a meticulously crafted product where small touches make a significant impact on your overall experience.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Quickly build an effective pricing table for your potential customers with this layout.
pricing.description: It's built with default Material UI components with little customization.
